mapper.insert: insert into goods(gdsCode, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsDesc, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg) values(#{gdsCode}, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsDesc}, #{gdsImg}, #{gdsThumbImg})
mapper.select: select g.gdsCode, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsDesc, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg, gdsDate from goods g inner join category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode

select g.gdsCode, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsDesc, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg, gdsDate from goods g inner join category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.gdsCode = #{gdsNum}

select o.orderId, o.userId, o.orderRecvr, o.orderZipCode, o.orderAddr1, o.orderAddr2, o.orderTel1, o.orderTel2, o.orderTel3, o.orderDate, d.gdsCode,d.cartStock, p.process from ordertbl o inner join orderDetail d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join process p on o.orderId = p.orderId

select o.orderId, d.gdsCode, d.cartStock, p.process, g.gdsThumbImg from ordertbl o inner join orderDetail d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join process p on o.orderId = p.orderId inner join goods g on d.gdsCode = g.gdsCode where process = 0

select o.orderId, d.gdsCode, d.cartStock, p.process, g.gdsThumbImg from ordertbl o inner join orderDetail d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join process p on o.orderId = p.orderId inner join goods g on d.gdsCode = g.gdsCode where process = 1
